snippet: Team doctors, trainers and health specialists tried to assuage the players’ worries after tight end Daniel Fells was found to have the dangerous bacterial infection.
abstract: New York Giants hold meetings with players concerned for their health after doctors determine tight end Daniel Fells has methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus, or MRSA, dangerous bacterial infection.
lead_paragraph: Team doctors, trainers and health specialists tried to assuage the players’ worries after tight end Daniel Fells was found to have the dangerous bacterial infection.

headline.main: Giants Are Briefed on MRSA as Teammate Recovers
headline.print_headline: Giants Get an Education in MRSA as a Teammate Recovers
